alert.note: Alert for Coastal Cameron (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued December 22 at 6:14PM CST until December 23 at 4:00AM CST by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 4 AM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding expected. * WHERE...Coastal Cameron County. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 4 AM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Nuisance flooding is expected, with water reaching or pushing into the dunes on South Padre Island. Vehicles, except those with four wheel drive and high wheel bases, will be unable to be driven on the beach. This includes locations north of Public Beach Access #3. Minor to moderate beach erosion is expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Water may push south of South Bay, across portions of Highway 4, west of Boca Chica Village into Friday morning.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
